TEXT.TITLE: BEST BUY <BBUY> MARCH SALES RISE
TEXT.BODY: Best Buy Co Inc said its sales for March rose to 26.1 mln dlrs from 11.9 mln dlrs in the comparable 1986 period. It said sales for the fiscal year ended March 31 rose to 329.5 mln dlrs from 113.1 mln dlrs a year earlier. The company said sales performance was based on the addition of 12 new retail facilities.
